member.name: T:System.Runtime.Serialization.KnownTypeAttribute
member.summary: Specifies types that should be recognized by the System.Runtime.Serialization.DataContractSerializer when serializing or deserializing a given type.

member.name: M:System.Runtime.Serialization.KnownTypeAttribute.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the System.Runtime.Serialization.KnownTypeAttribute class with the name of a method that returns an System.Collections.IEnumerable of known types.

member.name: M:System.Runtime.Serialization.KnownTypeAttribute.#ctor(System.Type)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the System.Runtime.Serialization.KnownTypeAttribute class with the specified type.
member.param: The System.Type that is included as a known type when serializing or deserializing data.

member.name: M:System.Runtime.Serialization.KnownTypeAttribute.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the System.Runtime.Serialization.KnownTypeAttribute class with the name of a method that returns an System.Collections.IEnumerable of known types.
member.param: The name of the method that returns an System.Collections.IEnumerable of types used when serializing or deserializing data.

members.member:
Returns: A System.String that contains the name of the method on the type defined by the System.Runtime.Serialization.KnownTypeAttribute class.
Gets the name of a method that will return a list of types that should be recognized during serialization or deserialization.

Returns: The System.Type that is used during serialization or deserialization.
Gets the type that should be recognized during serialization or deserialization by the System.Runtime.Serialization.DataContractSerializer.

member.name: T:System.Runtime.Serialization.CollectionDataContractAttribute
member.summary: When applied to a collection type, enables custom specification of the collection item elements. This attribute can be applied only to types that are recognized by the System.Runtime.Serialization.DataContractSerializer as valid, serializable collections.

member.name: M:System.Runtime.Serialization.CollectionDataContractAttribute.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the System.Runtime.Serialization.CollectionDataContractAttribute class.

member.name: P:System.Runtime.Serialization.CollectionDataContractAttribute.IsReference
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether to preserve object reference data.

member.name: P:System.Runtime.Serialization.CollectionDataContractAttribute.ItemName
member.summary: Gets or sets a custom name for a collection element.

member.name: P:System.Runtime.Serialization.CollectionDataContractAttribute.KeyName
member.summary: Gets or sets the custom name for a dictionary key name.

member.name: P:System.Runtime.Serialization.CollectionDataContractAttribute.Name
member.summary: Gets or sets the data contract name for the collection type.

member.name: P:System.Runtime.Serialization.CollectionDataContractAttribute.Namespace
member.summary: Gets or sets the namespace for the data contract.

member.name: P:System.Runtime.Serialization.CollectionDataContractAttribute.ValueName
member.summary: Gets or sets the custom name for a dictionary value name.

member.name: T:System.Runtime.Serialization.DataContractAttribute
member.summary: Specifies that the type defines or implements a data contract and is serializable by a serializer, such as the System.Runtime.Serialization.DataContractSerializer. To make their type serializable, type authors must define a data contract for their type.

member.name: M:System.Runtime.Serialization.DataContractAttribute.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the DataContractAttribute class.

member.name: P:System.Runtime.Serialization.DataContractAttribute.IsReference
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether to preserve object reference data.

member.name: P:System.Runtime.Serialization.DataContractAttribute.Name
member.summary: Gets or sets the name of the data contract for the type.

member.name: P:System.Runtime.Serialization.DataContractAttribute.Namespace
member.summary: Gets or sets the namespace for the data contract for the type.

member.name: T:System.Runtime.Serialization.EnumMemberAttribute
member.summary: Specifies that the field is an enumeration member and should be serialized.

member.name: M:System.Runtime.Serialization.EnumMemberAttribute.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the System.Runtime.Serialization.EnumMemberAttribute class.

members.member:
Returns: The value associated with the enumeration member.
Gets or sets the value associated with the enumeration member the attribute is applied to.

member.name: T:System.Runtime.Serialization.ExtensionDataObject
member.summary: Stores data from a versioned data contract that has been extended by adding new members.

member.name: T:System.Runtime.Serialization.IExtensibleDataObject
member.summary: Provides a data structure to store extra data encountered by the System.Runtime.Serialization.XmlObjectSerializer during deserialization of a type marked with the System.Runtime.Serialization.DataContractAttribute attribute.

member.name: P:System.Runtime.Serialization.IExtensibleDataObject.ExtensionData
member.summary: Gets or sets the structure that contains extra data.

member.name: T:System.Runtime.Serialization.DataMemberAttribute
member.summary: When applied to the member of a type, specifies that the member is part of a data contract and is serializable by the DataContractSerializer.

member.name: M:System.Runtime.Serialization.DataMemberAttribute.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the DataMemberAttribute class.

member.name: P:System.Runtime.Serialization.DataMemberAttribute.EmitDefaultValue
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that specifies whether to serialize the default value for a field or property being serialized.

member.name: P:System.Runtime.Serialization.DataMemberAttribute.IsRequired
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that instructs the serialization engine that the member must be present when reading or deserializing.

member.name: P:System.Runtime.Serialization.DataMemberAttribute.Name
member.summary: Gets or sets a data member name.

member.name: P:System.Runtime.Serialization.DataMemberAttribute.Order
member.summary: Gets or sets the order of serialization and deserialization of a member.
